tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE auditing_activities (
 event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 event_description TEXT,
 event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 user_id INT,
 user_role TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_log (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_time TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_time TIMESTAMP,
    activity_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  alert_description TEXT,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE admin_activity (
    admin_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    admin_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    details TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE audit_events (event_id INT PRIMARY KEY, event_type VARCHAR(50), event_timestamp TIMESTAMP, user_id INT, event_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE user_activities (activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, activity_type VARCHAR(50), activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP, activity_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE user_sessions (session_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, session_start TIMESTAMP, session_end TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE login_attempts (attempt_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, login_timestamp TIMESTAMP, login_status VARCHAR(20), login_ip VARCHAR(50)
CREATE TABLE session_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, session_id INT, log_timestamp TIMESTAMP, log_message TEXT)
